      • findColor

        public ArrayList<TrackedElement> findColor(String name,
                                           int ref2,
                                           int time,
                                           int erosion)
        For now it only finds one color.
        Parameters:
        name - can be "red", "blue" or something else to disable this matching.
        ref2 - Reference color found by the camera somewhere. -1 to disable it.
        time - currernt time in Processing.
        erosion - Erosion to apply before the tracking.
        Returns:
        List of colored elements found
